title: T-Mobile Advertising Solutions Expands With AI-Powered Audience Graph
summary: T-Mobile's ad division leverages deterministic mobile data from 120M+ subscribers to build an AI-enhanced audience graph, offering advertisers cookieless targeting with carrier-level precision.

title: 5G-Powered AR Experiences Become Viable Marketing Channel, Verizon Reports
summary: Verizon shares campaign data showing 5G-enabled AR brand activations drive 3x higher engagement than standard mobile ads, with latency now low enough for real-time interactive experiences.

title: AT&T and Publicis Launch Cross-Screen Identity Solution Using Mobile Data
summary: AT&T partners with Publicis Groupe to offer advertisers a privacy-compliant identity resolution tool powered by aggregated mobile carrier data, bridging the CTV-to-mobile measurement gap.

title: Telecom Brands Race to Reposition as AI-First Companies in 2026 Campaigns
summary: Major US carriers shift brand messaging from network speed to AI capabilities, with AT&T, Verizon, and T-Mobile all launching campaigns emphasizing their AI-powered customer experiences.

title: RCS Messaging Finally Gets Traction as Apple Adopts Standard, Opening New Marketing Channel
summary: With Apple now fully supporting RCS, brands gain access to rich media messaging across all major mobile platforms, creating a powerful new direct marketing channel with 98% open rates.

title: Comcast's Unified Advertising Division Merges Cable, Streaming, and Broadband Data
summary: Comcast consolidates its advertising operations into a single entity, combining Peacock streaming data with Xfinity broadband and linear cable insights for unified household-level targeting.
